description: From cut +‎ purse: originally, purses were worn by a strap at the girdle, which the thief would cut.

entries.meaning: A thief who steals from others' purses or pockets in public.
examples: The Gipsie snap & Pedroare none of Toms Comradoes,yͤ punck I skorne, & yͤ cutpurse sworn& yͤ roring boyes brauadoes
